      private ArrayList<String> tokens
      ArrayList where active user's tokens will be stored

    • attemptRepository

      @Autowired private AttemptRepository attemptRepository
      Repository where the queries that interact with the attempt collection are stored

    • imagenRepository

      Repository where the queries that interact with the image collection are stored

      Repository where the queries that interact with the user collection are stored

  • Method Details

    • viewImages

      @GetMapping("imgini/dailyImage") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> viewImages(@RequestParam("token") String userToken)
      Parameters:
      userToken - Token that will authenticate the user
      Returns:
      A JSON following the structure of the object Imagen with data about today's image

    • infiniteImage

      @GetMapping("imgini/infiniteImage") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> infiniteImage(@RequestParam("token") String userToken, @RequestParam("theme") String imgTheme)
      Parameters:
      userToken - Token that will authenticate the user
      imgTheme - String with the theme of the image to be retrieved
      Returns:
      A JSON following the structure of the object Imagen with data about a randomly selected image from the database, matching the specified theme

    • logout

      @GetMapping("imgini/logout") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> logout(@RequestParam("token") String userToken)
      Parameters:
      userToken - Token that will authenticate the user
      Returns:
      Nothing, HTTPStatus NO_CONTENT if successfully logged out, or HTTPStatus NOT_FOUND if couldn't find user

    • getRanking

      @GetMapping("imgini/ranking") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> getRanking(@RequestParam("token") String userToken, @RequestParam("page") int page, @RequestParam("size") int size)
      Parameters:
      userToken - Token that will authenticate the user
      page - Page number to show
      size - Size of the user array
      Returns:
      A JSON following the structure of the object ranking, with pagination included to limit the number of displayed users per page

    • userInfo

      @GetMapping("imgini/userInfo") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> userInfo(@RequestParam("token") String userToken, @RequestParam("username") String username)
      Parameters:
      userToken - Token that will authenticate the user
      username - String Name of the user to retrieve info from
      Returns:
      A JSON following the structure of the object UserInfo, with data about the user and a link to the endpoint that displays their streak and attempt history

    • streak

      @GetMapping("imgini/streak") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> streak(@RequestParam("token") String userToken, @RequestParam("username") String username, @RequestParam("page") int page, @RequestParam("size") int size)
      Parameters:
      userToken - Token that will authenticate the user
      username - String Name of the user to retrieve streak from
      page - Page number to show
      size - Size of the user array
      Returns:
      A JSON following the structure of the object AttemptHistory, with pagination included to limit the number of attempt registries to show per page, and the specified user's current streak

    • imgsThemes

      @GetMapping("imgini/imgsThemes") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> imgsThemes(@RequestParam("token") String userToken)
      Parameters:
      userToken - Token that will authenticate the user
      Returns:
      An array of Strings with all the image themes present in the database

    • getAttempt

      @GetMapping("imgini/getAttempt") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> getAttempt(@RequestParam("token") String userToken, @RequestParam("username") String username)
      Parameters:
      userToken - Token that will authenticate the user
      username - String name of the user to retrieve today's attempt from
      Returns:
      A JSON following the structure of the object AttemptDTO, with data about today's attempt. If the specified user doesn't have an attempt today, it returns HttpStatus NOT_FOUND

    • register

      @PostMapping("imgini/register") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> register(@RequestBody UserDTO userDTO)
      Parameters:
      userDTO - Object with the new user's username and password
      Returns:
      HttpStatus FORBIDDEN if the user is already present, or HttpStatus OK if created successfully

    • login

      @PostMapping("imgini/login") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> login(@RequestBody UserDTO userDTO)
      Parameters:
      userDTO - Object with the new user's username and password
      Returns:
      HttpStatus NOT_FOUND if the user is not present, or HttpStatus OK if user is found and credentials match

    • registerAttempt

      @PostMapping("imgini/newAttempt") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> registerAttempt(@RequestBody AttemptDTO attemptDTO, @RequestParam("token") String userToken)
      Parameters:
      attemptDTO - Object with the attempt info to be created
      userToken - Token that will authenticate the user
      Returns:
      HttpStatus FORBIDDEN if an attempt has already been created today, or HttpStatus NO_CONTENT if the attempt is created successfully

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("imgini/delete") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteUser(@RequestParam("name") String name, @RequestParam("password") String password, @RequestParam("token") String userToken)
      Parameters:
      name - String Name of the user to be deleted
      password - String Password of the user to be deleted
      userToken - Token that will authenticate the user
      Returns:
      HttpStatus NOT_FOUND if the user couldn't be found, or HttpStatus NO_CONTENT if user and their attempts have been deleted successfully

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping("imgini/update") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updateUser(@RequestParam("token") String userToken, @RequestBody UserPUT updatedUser)
      Parameters:
      userToken - Token that will authenticate the user
      updatedUser - Object with the updated information of the user
      Returns:
      HttpStatus NOT_FOUND if the user couldn't be found, or HttpStatus NO_CONTENT if the user has been updated successfully
